questions.question: What is the primary function of JavaFX WebView?
answers: To render web content (HTML/CSS/JavaScript) within a JavaFX application

questions.question: Which of the following is NOT a capability of JavaFX WebView?
answers: Bidirectional communication between Java and JavaScript

questions.question: How can content be loaded into JavaFX WebView? (Select all that apply)
answers: From a file in the classpath

questions.question: What is the purpose of the JavaFX WebEngine class?
answers: To manage the WebView's rendering of web content and interactions with JavaScript
To create and manage database connections

questions.question: What is the WebView node used for in JavaFX?
answers: To display web content within a JavaFX application

questions.question: Which library or engine is behind the JavaFX WebView's web rendering capabilities?
Which URL provides an overview of JavaFX WebView?
Which of the following is a valid way to customize WebView's appearance and behavior?
